summary:
Until recently, interim CEO ACTIAM NV, a leading European ESG asset manager.  Former Managing Board member of ABN AMRO Asset Management and Robeco. 
Extensive experience in non-executive board positions in Europe and Asia Pacific, as well as interim and advisory roles to large and medium sized companies in a range of industries and across geographies (main focus Europe and Asia Pacific).  

Driven international leader with proven experience of developing and implementing strategy, delivering growth, and leading challenging transformational change in varying competitive environments.  Familiar with the dynamics of complex cross-border corporations as well as the challenges of smaller organisations experiencing fast growth.
 
Broad experience within the financial services sector (private equity, asset management, private banking, insurance), and  through advisor/interim management services and various supervisory board roles also in the public sector, NGO's and the corporate sector.

profile_positions.title: Member of various Supervisory Boards

profile_positions.description:
As Chairman of the Board of ACTIAM, responsible for navigating this leading ESG asset manager to a higher level of prominence, growing it nationally and internationally through its portable and award winning ESG and Impact capabilities, developing the organization to be fit for such growth and develop and implement strategic change.
Developed and implemented a 3-pillar strategy which was completed with the sale of ACTIAM to Cardano. After the succesful acquisition of ACTIAM by Cardano, stepped down as chairman and member of the board and stayed on as an advisor during the early months of the migration untill April 2022.
profile_positions.title: Interim CEO ACTIAM NV

profile_positions.description:
Pioneered the establishment of the world's most impactful Diabetes-Reverse programs, developed and and executed by Dutch Foundation Voeding Leeft, into Hong Kong. The pilot programme yielded similar results as in The Netherlands (where this programme has served 3000+ patients ain the past 6 years); 85% of the participants reversed their diabetes by life style change  and in the majority of cases people have substantially reduced medication or are no lomger using any.
The intend is to roll out the programme more permanently and on a larger scale in selected Asian countries. An assessment of its viability to be conducted in 2023
profile_positions.title: Partner APAC

profile_positions.description:
Was involved in the acquisition of Dutch insurance firm Conservatrix NV by Eli Global (2017). As Supervisory Board member Conservatrix NV (and head of the Audit and Risk Committee) led the financial restruring of Conservatrix (May - August 2017). 
As CEO of APAC and based in Hong Kong, set up Eli Global's APAC office from where APAC acquisitions were initiated. Set out an acquisition strategy and commenced with implementing deals.
After some turbulent times and earlier than planned I decided to leave both as CEO APAC and Supervisory Board member Conservatrix by the end of 2017.

profile_positions.description: River Plate House (RPH) was a Canadian based asset manager specialising in long/short global government bonds established in 2010. Raised an initial USD 100 million from own network of clients in North America, Asia-Pacific and Europe under challenging market conditions, built a committed pipeline of USD 500 million of Assets Under Management
